docs.text: " houston . we have a serious problem . "
docs.label: negative

docs.text: after making " mission : impossible " , brian de palma has a lot to live up to .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: by making an epic science fiction and inviting great cast and talented crew , he hopes to reach the modern audience .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and the possibilities are certainly there , but the result is a great disaster .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: starting in a near future , with a prologue copied from " apollo 13 " , de palma slowly builds up his " story " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the human race has already set foot on mars .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: a research expedition has vanished without trace on the red planet and another one has been sent to find out what happened .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: this is basically the whole plot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: so it's hard to imagine that it can be stretched to 2 hours .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: but de palma manages to do that .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is not a very good achievement .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: as we follow this expedition to mars and watch them slowly float in space , the hardest thing to do is stay awake .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the film's major problem is that it tries to seem more clever than it is .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: david mamet's dialogue , while trying to seem natural , is distant and simply fake .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: de palma and mamet wanted to combine action with a thought provoking plot .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: the result is more like an unsuccessful mutation of kubrick's " 2001 : a space odyssey " , " apollo 13 " and " godzilla " .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: to make time pass , the creators have inserted several " refreshing " scientific details , that would not convince a half-crazed frog .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it consists of multiple copies and direct ripp-offs from several great science fiction films and stories .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: when it finally presents an almost original idea , it falls flat because of its uncovered stupidity .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i can't even call this film predictable , since no one with a healthy imagination can come up with something like this .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: sometimes it gets so cheesy , that you'll start laughing when you're supposed to cry and cry when you're supposed to laugh .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: you'll see enormous sandstorms , hear mysterious sounds and , last but not least , on this " constantly surprising " tour you'll see -- an alien .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it's really hard to find comparisons to such an experience , and i know that i've never said that before ( i thought i never would ) , but " lost in space " is actually better .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: that's an achievement in itself !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: director brian de palma has stroke gold with " untouchables " that became an instant american classic .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is for this film that he will be remembered , while all his other failures will be forgotten .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: he'll live to fight another day !
docs.label: negative

docs.text: i send the actors my condolences , since they truly do try to transform into their undeveloped and dull characters .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: and both the cinematography , production design and art direction are very decent .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: it is because of the achievement of 254 people , that i rate this film 2/10 .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: unfortunately their hard work was in vain .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you have problems with insomnia , i recommend you this film .
docs.label: negative

docs.text: if you're not asleep within the first half hour , consult your doctor .
docs.label: negative
